Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • KeyedItem<java.lang.String>
      • Customer

  • public class Customer
extends KeyedItem<java.lang.String>
    should we perform checkout checks for add and remove -- completed Should we for add/sim time? This class is the Customer class that extends the KeyedItem class, with the Keyed Item being a String describing the name. It describes the customer to be used in the Shopping Center model. It holds values for names, amount of items in cart, time in store, and a data field to determine if in checkout. Appropriate getters, setters, and toString was created to properly access all values. One Construcor is implemented that takes in one parameter of type String for the customer name.

      The only Constructor for the Customer class which takes one parameter that represent the Customer name.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Customer

        public Customer(java.lang.String name)
        The only Constructor for the Customer class which takes one parameter that represent the Customer name. The constructor calls upon the KeyedItem classes constructor which instantiates the key as the Strng type name. After, it sets totalTime and itemAmount to 0, it sets checkOut boolean to false.
        Parameters:
        name - - String type that represents the Customer's name

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem()
        Method to add an item to the customers cart. No need to track what item, so only update amount of items counter. Performs addition of one value if not in a checkout lane. If in a checkout line, nothing occurs.

      • updateTime

        public void updateTime()
        Method to update time customer spends in store. This only updates by one to showcase one minute each time it is called.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Getter method to return name of customer.
        Returns:
        name -- String type for name of customer.

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Setter method to reasssign name data field of customer.
        Parameters:
        name - -- String variable to be update data field name for customer

      • getTotalTime

        public int getTotalTime()
        Getter method to return value of total time spent in store for customer.
        Returns:
        totalTime - int type that describes total time in minutes spent in store by the customer.

      • setTotalTime

        public void setTotalTime(int totalTime)
        Setter method to reassign totalTime data field which describes time in store to paramter value.
        Parameters:
        totalTime - -- int type to be assigned to totalTime data field.

      • getItemAmount

        public int getItemAmount()
        Getter mehtod to return total amount of items in customers cart
        Returns:
        itemAmount -- int type data field describing amount of items in cart

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem()
        Method to remove one item from customer cart. When method is called, confimration the customer is not in a checkout line is done, and if not in checkout, itemAmount data field is decremented. If not, nothing occurs

      • setCheckOut

        public void setCheckOut(boolean status)
        Setter method to set checkout line status of customer. checkOut data field describes if a customer is in a checkout line. The method sets to whatever the value of the parameter is passed in.
        Parameters:
        status - - boolean type describing new status of customer, if in a checkout line, or just in store.

      • getCheckOut

        public boolean getCheckOut()
        Getter method to get Checkout status of customer.
        Returns:
        checkOut -- boolean type checkOut data field describing if the customer is in a checkout line or just the store.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        toString method to describe the customer. Puts customer name, itemAmount, totalTime, and checkOut status in a string delimited by spaces.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String type describing the customer
